type: Legendary Creature – Human Dragon Lord Noble
rules_text:
Trample, vigilance
[i]Song and Stone[/i] – You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
[i]Water's Edge[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 4 or greater, draw a card.
[i]Boundless[/i] – You have no maximum hand size.
